game

Class Obstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Element
      • game.GameParticle
        • game.Obstacle

  • public class Obstacle
extends GameParticle
    The "Obstacle" class. This class creates objects to act as obstacles for the medium and difficult levels. The obstacles move along a predefined path on the game screen. It is, by extension, a GameParticle.
    Version:
    1.0, May 29 2014., 1.1, June 3 2014. (added currentStep (5 step wait), so clouds move slower), 1.2, June 5 2014. (JavaDoc is current), 2.0, June 8 2014. (Now obstacle instead if acidcloud, added glow for difficult), 2.1, June 10 2014. (JavaDoc)
    Author:
    Chusa Nguyen, Anqi Wu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int currentStep
      currentStep - int - Stores the current number of steps after it was updated.
      private boolean forwards
      forwards - boolean - Determines whether the acid cloud will move forwards or backwards.
      private boolean glow
      glow - boolean - Stores whether the obstacle should glow.
      private int steps
      steps - int - Counter which keeps track of the number of columns the acid cloud has moved.
      private int updateCount
      updateCount - int - Counter which keeps track of the number of times the screen updates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Obstacle

        public Obstacle(java.lang.String newName,
        Location newLocation,
        int charge,
        boolean forwards,
        int level)
        The class constructor. It creates an obstacle object with the specified name, at a specified location and a given charge, as well as set its initial direction of movement.
        Parameters:
        newName - - String - String representation of this object's name.
        newLocation - - Location - The location given upon creation.
        charge - - int - The charge of the AcidCloud.
        forwards - - boolean - Determines whether the first step will be forwards or backwards.
        level - - int - Integer representation of the level difficulty this Obstacle object is being constructed for.

    • Method Detail

      • glow

        public void glow()
        Sets the obstacle to glow. This method is only available for Absorber elements. The icon is changed.

      • getGlow

        public boolean getGlow()
        Returns whether the obstacle is glowing.
        Returns:
        A boolean that represents whether the obstacle is glowing.

      • setMoveForwards

        public void setMoveForwards(boolean forwards)
        The "setMoveForwards" method. It sets the current value of the instance variable "forwards".
        Parameters:
        forwards - boolean - The new value of the instance level variable, "forwards".

      • getMoveForwards

        public boolean getMoveForwards()
        The "getMoveForwards" method. It returns whether this object is moving forwards or not.
        Returns:
        The current value of "forwards", which represents whether this object is moving forwards or not.

      • move

        public void move()
        The "move" method. It changes the location of this object to follow a predefined path, as determined by the if structure. The AcidCloud moves every 5 updates.

      • update

        public void update()
        The "update" method, which updates the current object when the game screen is refreshed/updated.
        Overrides:
        update in class GameParticle

      • setCurrentStep

        Sets the current step of the cloud.
        Parameters:
        steps - - int - The number of calls to update before the element moves.
